title: Advanced Mathematical Communication Competency Development Project through Statistical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic statistical concepts (mean, variance, standard deviation) and data interpretation experience
context.additional_context: Course focused on cultivating data-driven communication skills required in actual workplace settings.

learning_goals: Students can apply statistical concepts to create analytical reports using real-world professional field data
Learners can explain complex statistical results to non-experts using visual materials (graphs/infographics)
Participants can logically present the process of selecting and interpreting statistical models in team-based projects (5-minute presentation + 3-minute Q&A)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
